name: BEST WESTERN Marseille Aeroport

reviews.text: The hotel is very close to the airport. Shuttle service is great. The service is very good. For an airport hotel, this hotel has a reasonable good restaurant with a very good choice of menue. The value for money is good.
reviews.title: Good airport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We'd decided to stay overnight rather than driving into the old part of Marseille. So glad we did - the restaurant was open until 2130 so we were able to have a meal (varied with home-cooked styles as well as 'fancy' restaurant-type dishes). Staff at both reception and restaurant were excellent. The room given to us smelled strongly of smoke - we called reception asking for another and initially were told sorry, no, they were full. Then the gentleman said he'd be able to swap us after all, and came up to where we were so we didn't have to go back to reception. Excellent service!
reviews.title: Perfect for an overnight after arriving around 2030

reviews.text: We stayed here our last night in France :( because of the location to the airport. We had a 7:00am flight home. The hotel was spotless, and a shuttle picked us up at the train station that evening and then transported us the next morning at 5:00am to the airport for no extra charge. Included in the price is breakfast, but it didn't start until 6:am. It is a great hotel to stay at being so close to the airport and the extras, like shuttle and breakfast make it will worth it!
reviews.title: Great location and Service!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great room. Very good dining room. Very good service. Lovely open lobby several storeys high. Well decorated. Quiet even if across from the Marignanne airport.
reviews.title: A good surprise

reviews.text: Free shuttle to/from airport (on demand).
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: I stayed here recently before an early morning flight. The hotel staff was professional, very comfortable and clean room. The restaurant was good. Very close to the airport and perfect for what I needed. Will stay here again if necessary.
reviews.title: Perfect for the night before a flight

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Enforced stay here when Costa Cruises failed to collect us from Marseille as a result of bad weather.
reviews.title: A pleasant port in a storm

reviews.text: This turned out to be a haven of relative peace and calm, with very helpful gentleman on reception. breakfast was pretty good.
reviews.title: Prison camp Best Western

reviews.text: They have an outdoor pool outside, but it was only May in Marseille and a cold wet one too.
reviews.title: Better Service than the Neighboring Holiday Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The title was a little unfair. The hotel was extemely close to the aiport and the transfer was just a few mins. There was no noise from the aiport and the service, food and rooms were all pretty good. I liked the kettle in my room which you don't always get in France. There was a perfectly fine gym and pool too.
reviews.title: Can't get closer to the airport.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went off to the airport to find our hotel. Its address was Vitrolles, and I had forgotten to look up its exact location, so we exited the autoroute at Vitrolles and drove around, but couldn’t find it. Finally, I went into a local furniture store and was lucky enough to find a very cooperative cashier who spoke English. We looked up the address on her computer, she drew me a map, we returned to the autoroute, exited at the airport, and found the hotel right there.
reviews.title: A good last night in Provence

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was a pleasant hotel, new or renovated, and our room was just fine. We emptied the car for our final packing, then returned her and called the hotel to be picked up by their shuttle. We ate outside and had a very good dinner.
reviews.title: OK, but don't expect breakfast or shampoo

reviews.text: The next morning, after a good breakfast, we took the shuttle back to the airport, about a five minute trip. This was a very good and convenient place to stay, especially when leaving the airport in the morning..
reviews.title: Working vist to marseille

reviews.text: This was our first stay at a Best Western Hotel.
reviews.title: Overpriced but clean
More than just convenient to the airport
reviews.text: We stayed one night for 147 Euros for a double room. On top of this, they put a charge of 26 Euros extra for breakfast on our bill the next morning until we told them that we didn't eat breakfast. There had been an Air France air traffic controller strike just before we arrived, and the hotel had lost bookings. It would have been a nice gesture for them to spot us breakfast since we did turn up. I gave them the opportunity to do this when I called in the morning to ask about the charge for breakfast, telling them that I assumed it was included, there is nothing about breakfast on my contract and most certainly the price for breakfast was a complete mystery until we got there. I even told the person that we had got up early so that we could enjoy breakfast before we left for the airport. No dice.

Benefitting from some updates since last year. Tidier bathrooms, good beds, and curtains that fit across the windows and actually keep out the daylight when required. Always a curates egg this place (good in parts) the staff range from the extraordinarily helpful and pleasant, to the downright rude (little man who is the waiter in the restaurant).
reviews.title: Some Updates Recently

reviews.text: Have to say the menu on offer in the restaurant is very good indeed. A varied and imaginative menu - creative, colourful, thoughtful,and very tasty. A definite high point.
reviews.title: Very Good Airport Hotel

reviews.text: A hotel of this position and standing really ought to update the bar and have a decent sports channel TV. The tiny gym is really an afterthought, and the gear is getting very tired - it's placed in an unloved part of the hotel and is largely forgotten - as is the water refill to the chiller.
reviews.title: good value and convenient
very good
reviews.text: But, I keep returning, so it can't be all bad. Just wish they'd go the extra mile with the TV channels (all/mostly French). WiFi good speeds nowadays too - and no extra charge, London hotels take note!
I recently stayed here while on business. The staff are all very attentive, including the shuttle bus driver who is very efficient. The restaurant is a step up from some of the other airport hotels.
reviews.title: Not great, but not bad either.

aka: Best Western Marseille Aeroport Hotel Vitrolles
